ygData.subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She was totally taken back.  She never expected that to happen. She pulled away from him and looked at him  with utter shock on her face.

::KitKat::

She was totally taken back.  She never expected that to happen. She 
pulled away from him and looked at him  with utter shock on her 
face. "You....you....you..ah...you..." she turned and put her hand 
against the wall. She was in total shock.  She didn't know what to 
say or think.  Thoughts of Drillbit killing her was one though that 
ran through her mind.   The other was the thought of Destructor 
killing Drillbit.  She felt her spark pound as she still couldn't 
believe what just happened.  She knew one thing was for certain.  She 
had a big problem on her hands.  If she refused Destructor, he could 
take away everything that he had given them.  That would leave her 
oroginal troops helpless.  She didn't know what to do.  She faced the 
wall, as her spark pounded and her mind went scattering.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  I know you would. But listen. It will never work. You have no idea 
how long 
> the plan of the destruction of the alliance and maximals has gone. 
It started 
> in motion many months ago. Now near starting only one peace is 
needed. The 
> maximals. If this is too work we must have them. But i will follow 
any order 
> you give." he looked into her eyes. He couldnt stand it. It made 
his spark of 
> stone asa liquid as water. He threw down his entire fear. Grabbed 
her and 
> kissed her.....
